entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 34. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h. Low minus 34. Wind chill near minus 48. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 29. POP 30%

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 26 by morning. POP 30%
